<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_106585</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106585</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Refraction of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the bending of a light beam as it passes through an interface between two materials having different indices of refraction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verbiegen eines 
Lichtstrahls, während sie durch eine Schnittstelle zwischen zwei 
Materialien überschreitet, die unterschiedliche 
Brechungskoeffizienten haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le dépliement d'un 
faisceau lumineux pendant qu'elle traverse une interface entre deux 
matériaux ayant différents indices de réfraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a dobra de um feixe 
luminoso enquanto passa através de uma relação entre dois materiais
que têm deslocamentos predeterminados de refraction diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la piegatura di un 
raggio di luce mentre attraversa un'interfaccia fra due materiali che 
hanno indici di rifrazione differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την κάμψη μιας ελαφριάς 
ακτίνας καθώς περνά μέσω μιας διαπροσωπείας μεταξύ δύο υλικών 
που έχουν τα διαφορετικά ευρετήρια της διάθλασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la flexión de un rayo 
de luz mientras que pasa a través de un interfaz entre dos materiales
que tienen diversos índice de refracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbiegen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahldiagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungsindex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dépliement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons légers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diagramme de rayon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento predeterminado refractive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi luminosi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema del raggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
